channel.title: ArmyPkz Need Coder's! [317]
channel.description:
Hello guy's it's Cody here and I decided to make a PI Server so apply now or miss all the fun!
I've been wanting to make a server for year's and now here i am doing it and i need some help!
What I am for in this server is perfect combat, to make all of our player's happy and to have a all around awesome server
Once we get donation's It will all go to the server and it's improvement no matter what
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/nc1h1h.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/mtxztl.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/bfrp8j.jpg[/img]
Here is the layout i prefer you use to apply! In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: How old are you?: MSN: What position do you want? (Coder.GFX) How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: What time zone are you in?: How long will you be on everyday?: Why do you want to become part of this server?:
Coder's get admin
I Also need a GFX Designer!
Coder's 0/1
Ok Thank's Guy's!

item.title: ArmyPkz Need Coder's! [317]
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:19, topic:436210”]I checked the IP’s of the two accounts and they do not match, however they are in the same continent, wouldn’t trust his word for it 100% though.

If army could give me a confirmation on this, that would be great, multiple accounts are against the rules, and the other account will be banned.[/quote]
Only you would want the army so you could BANBANBAN. <3

item.title: ArmyPkz Need Coder's! [317]
item.dc:creator: @HandgunSally HandgunSally
item.description:
@HandgunSally wrote:

THIS KID IS AN IDIOT… he knows nothing about anything, i spent the last 2 weeks hosting, coding, moderating, making website, buying domain, making web-client, fixing bugs, HE DID NOTHING I CANNOT stress enough much much of a waste of time this was… I swear I’m testing anyone i ever team up with again, learn from my mistakes!

if i had anymore time to spend its not even worth putting in this post for this fuck.

AND PLEASE I HOPE U DO REPLY WITH YOU DID SOMETHING, SO WE CAN ASK YOU HOW U DID IT…did you use Java or a Banana?

fuck

Someone could’ve warned me???

Read full topic

HandgunSally@yahoo.com
Programmer
java 1 year, c++ 3 years html5 and good with mysql php
(UTC-06:00) Central America
40+ a week
id like more info from you, I’m looking for a dedicated server i can help host or pay into hosting i need more hands on with java and I enjoy rsps’s.

i have no GFX designing skills whatsoever, would love to learn though

You have been accepted welcome to the team add me on MSN Gamerslif3@yahoo.com to start [size=3]This is ArmyPkzzz But im on a diffrent account[/size]
[/quote]I hope you know you can’t have multiple accounts…[/quote]

Maby he was at his friends computer and posted it from there. if you actually wanted to help him know there rules then you should post a link instead of just spamming this thread which is also against the rules…

Silent Cj, please do not ban his account because they are in the same CONTINENT…ffs take my word for it i do my backgrounds. I saw his previous posts in frustration to get into a development team and soon after he made his own. Please give him some time to sort this out. And please do not ban my future teammate yo

item.title: ArmyPkz Need Coder's! [317]
item.dc:creator: @HandgunSally HandgunSally
item.description:
@HandgunSally wrote:

Thanks Army added to msn,

this guy^ is he really a 14 year old kid that does not realize that his computer gives him his time zone, but he can program?

and maybe i’m out of line with this but

“noob servers needs someone to help them making it better” + me = why im reluctant to join a development team

my final point of frustration is how the hell did this guy get 50 rep…???

EDIT: To future readers of this thread. I have been accepted from 3 different DT’s that have yet to even make it to msn… if you are like me and enjoy this as a hobbie and take this seriously please contact me via msn, HandgunSally@yahoo.com i only have 2 hobbys fishing and programming its not even that hard to have a fucking “fishing team” of friends twice weekly…

Read full topic
